@description.name: @description
@description.body:
CSS Transition support checks.

Spec: http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-transitions/

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the (possibly vendor-prefixed) name of the CSS transition property

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|null} transition property name or null if not supported
@return.description: transition property name or null if not supported

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Main check method which returns an object if CSS transitions are supported. The object contains the following keys:
  • name The name of the CSS transition property
  • end-event The name of the end event

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Object|null} The described object or null if transitions are not supported.
@return.description: The described object or null if transitions are not supported.
